attributes.action: consider some form of reward to harry patch and henry allingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: harry patch and henry allingham are the only living men in this country who, survived the ww1. when they sadly pass away, ww1 will stop being living history and become just history. these men have been given nothing by our country, but have had top awards from the likes of france. they should at least get a tap on the should from a sword held by the queen

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
